comment: Being the Greek brat that I am...Spartacus is the way Romans spell it in Latin. Not Greek. In Greek......as in 'Spartakos' The letter U or Ypsilon in Greek...is pronounced like the letter E in English. Imagine what a difference...if it were spelled Spartaces. LOL
amr:
